name: Flying Car Transporter Truck Simulator - Futuristic Transformer Truck Stunts
name_original: Flying Car Transporter Truck Simulator - Futuristic Transformer Truck Stunts
description:
Ever thought of flying a truck being a truck pilot? No? Ever heard about flying truck games? Take your seat in the best flying truck simulator game available on the store. Drive your Transformer Truck and Fly like a Turbo Airplane. You can test your air craft pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time. Fly your plane around the world discover new landscapes, Drive your truck do stunts and drifts! Be the best truck driver! Be a pro kamaz truck pilot in this flying car free game.

Fly a big car transporter truck in this flying car transporter truck game where you have to transport loaded cars and monster trucks to the required destination on time. Time is short and you can’t wait caught in busy traffic. Use your special flying controls and fly your jumbo kamaz truck over the skies and reach your destination in no time in the best truck flying games.
